AssetContactParticipant.name: AssetContactParticipant
AssetContactParticipant.description: Represents a junction between the Asset and Contact objects describing the association between a participating contact and an asset.

AssetId.description: The asset associated with the contact.

ContactId.description: The contact associated with the asset.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the asset ended.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date when the association between the stakeholder and the asset was initiated.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the association between the stakeholder and the asset is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the asset contact participant.

StakeholderRole.description: Specifies the role of the associated contact.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the asset contact participant.
